articles.description: Kai Havertz scores a late winner as Arsenal beat Brentford to go top of the Premier League before Liverpool and Manchester City meet on Sunday.
articles.title: Havertz spares Ramsdale's blushes as Arsenal go top

articles.description: Marcus Smith kicks a last-gasp drop-goal as England produce their best display of the Steve Borthwick era to stun Ireland in a Six Nations thriller.
articles.title: Smith last-gasp drop-goal hands England victory

articles.description: Red Bull's Max Verstappen takes a comfortable victory in the Saudi Arabian Grand Prix, as Oliver Bearman finishes seventh for Ferrari.
articles.title: Saudi Arabian Grand Prix 2024: Max Verstappen wins as Oliver Bearman finishes seventh

articles.description: Missed opportunities cost England throughout their 4-1 series defeat by India, writes BBC cricket correspondent Jonathan Agnew.
articles.title: England's frustrating series of missed opportunities - Agnew

articles.description: Scotland concede 21 unanswered points in Rome, having folded similarly in Cardiff. Is a lack of leadership the problem?
articles.title: 'Scotland players abdicate responsibility in Italy'

articles.description: Harry Kane becomes the first man to score four hat-tricks in their debut Bundesliga season as Bayern Munich maintain pressure on Bayer Leverkusen.
articles.title: Kane sets hat-trick record as Bayern win 8-1

articles.description: Saturday's 2-0 win over Everton is one that will stabilise Manchester United's season, writes BBC Sport's Simon Stone.
articles.title: 'Win stabilises Man Utd season but Ten Hag future still unclear'

articles.description: Inter Milan move 18 points clear at the top of the Serie A table with a narrow win at Champions League-chasing Bologna.
articles.title: Inter Milan edge Bologna to move 18 points clear

articles.description: Wolves boost their hopes of playing European football next season as they beat Fulham to move up to eighth in the Premier League.
articles.title: Wolves beat Fulham to boost European hopes

articles.description: Briton Emma Raducanu reaches round three at Indian Wells after opponent Dayana Yastremska retires with an injury in the opening set.
articles.title: Indian Wells: Emma Raducanu into round three as Dayana Yastremska retires
